div.div: at Grove City, Pa. | Robert E Thorn Field

tr.td: Grove City wins toss, defers. Saint Vincent receives, defending S goal
Cole McCandless kickoff 20 yards to the SVC45, fair catch by Cody Lambert.

Ryan Crawford rush for 2 yards to the SVC47, fumble forced by Jason Skyrm, fumble by Ryan Crawford recovered by GRO Jimmy Cianciola at 50 yardline, Jimmy Cianciola for 9 yards to the SVC41 (Dustin Lowman).
